programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Shopping Shenanigans, Istanbul, Turkey - Glitch's wishes cause underground trouble in Istanbul - an ancient ceiling may collapse!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Svalbard Global Seed Vault, Norway - Ubercorn and Glitch head to the Svalbard Global Seed Vault. But, just like when they were cadets together, the two of them get into trouble.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep8
programme.desc: James the Super Engine - When James hears the children of Sodor talking about their latest comic book superhero, he imagines that he too can become a hero.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Ribbon Alvida - An excited Sarah & Duck take the Shallots to see the Ribbon Sisters perform with their family circus.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Snowball Skate - Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pumpkin - Stanley must keep Myrtle's pumpkin safe from Speedy the snail. He builds a series of obstacles and defences to protect it from the tenacious Speedy who tests Stanley's ingenuity.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Carnival - Stanley, Sophie and Benjamin make up a new game, 'Dino-Pirates'. This is such a good game, they use it as inspiration for Stanley's carnival float.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Different Folks - Monty and Gran disagree over ice cream flavours, leaving him unsure if people who like different things can still be friends.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep29
programme.desc: It's Time to Look for Clues - Cynthia has found a teddy lying on the ground - can JoJo and Gran Gran find its owner? JoJo discovers three clues - space, blue wool and a special label. Will they help JoJo and Gran Gran track down the owner of the lost teddy?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep22
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep23
programme.desc: Family Meeting - When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Brave Banana Badge - When thunder and lightning scares the squirrels, Duggee teaches them about bravery.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep39
programme.desc: The Getting On Badge - When the squirrels upset the mole by being noisy, Duggee suggests some team building.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Avocado - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the fabulous Avocados singing an operatic piece in their three unique voices.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Banana - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Banana revealing yet another astonishing secret about herself in the opera piece, "I've Got a Secret".

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Tin Can Games - It's the Tin Can Games and Evil Pea wants to win the Tin Can Trophy. She cheats in the final race by putting a magnet on Supertato's back to stop him from going super fast.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep33
programme.desc: Tablet Takeover - The Veggies are delighted with a new tablet they've found. When they're not looking, Evil Pea turns the tablet to evil mode. Soon the tablet takes over the supermarket.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Tickly - The Teletubbies enjoy doing 'Round and Round the Garden', especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep25
programme.desc: Y - Dee encourages a friend to say 'y', and they go on an adventure around the sound. They see some yo-yos and a yacht, do some yoga and even meet a yeti!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Thank You - The friends throw an amazing party for Helping Hand! But with so much to do, can Phoebe work with her friends to get everything ready in time?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Wiggly Worms - When Mayor Oki's pumpkins aren't big enough Messy and his friends muck in and save the day! With the help of some wiggly worms...

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep37
programme.desc: The Decider - The Heelers and Lucky's family get together to watch the big game, a fun family experiences that gets a little tense.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep36
programme.desc: Dirt - Judo desperately wants to play in the dirt with Bluey and Bingo, but she is not supposed to get herself dirty.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep40
programme.desc: Early Baby - Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Flying - Andy Day looks at a flying school for animals. In Antarctica, a wandering albatross chick masters the largest wings of any bird, and great grey owl chicks leap from the top of huge trees.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Singing Dinosaur - It's a big day for a parasaurolophus family as they try out their trumpets, much to the amusement of T-Rex and brachiosaurus.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Mission: Birthday Cake - Guide dog Kika works with Dr Amit to buy what they need for a birthday celebration.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Painted Dog and Coati - This episode features the painted dog and coati - their wild connection is they are both brilliant baby sitters.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep15
programme.desc: You've Got Mail - The pirates accidentally miss the postal delivery of Captain Captain's favourite magazine Perfectly Pirate and try to trick her into thinking she has already received it.
